/*
PROVA GRAFO 1 .. troppo tempo per calcolare da n=5 in poi.. 
(replica su test1bis.txt con n fino a 4)
*/

n=0;

new graph 1 {0,0} ;
/*
0
	*/
n=1 ;
new graph 4 {0,1} {0,2} {1,3} {2,3};
/*	
  1
0	3
  2
*/	
n=2	;
new graph 7 {0,1} {0,2} {1,3} {2,3} 
{3,4} {3,5} {4,6} {5,6};
/*
  1   4
0   3   6
  2   5
*/
n=3;
new graph 10 {0,1} {0,2} {1,3} {2,3} 
{3,4} {3,5} {4,6} {5,6} 
{6,7} {6,8} {7,9} {8,9};
/*
  1   4   7
0   3   6   9
  2   5   8
*/  
n=4;
new graph 13 {0,1} {0,2} {1,3} {2,3} 
{3,4} {3,5} {4,6} {5,6} 
{6,7} {6,8} {7,9} {8,9} 
{9,10} {9,11} {10,12} {11,12};
/*
  1   4   7   10
0   3   6   9    12
  2   5   8   11
*/  
n=5; 
new graph 16 {0,1} {0,2} {1,3} {2,3} 
{3,4} {3,5} {4,6} {5,6} 
{6,7} {6,8} {7,9} {8,9} 
{9,10} {9,11} {10,12} {11,12} 
{12,13} {12,14} {13,15} {14,15};
/* 
  1   4   7   10    13
0   3   6   9    12    15
  2   5   8   11    14
*/  
n=6;  
new graph 19 {0,1} {0,2} {1,3} {2,3} 
{3,4} {3,5} {4,6} {5,6} 
{6,7} {6,8} {7,9} {8,9} 
{9,10} {9,11} {10,12} {11,12} 
{12,13} {12,14} {13,15} {14,15} 
{15,16} {15,17} {16,18} {17,18};
/*  
  1   4   7   10    13    16
0   3   6   9    12    15    18
  2   5   8   11    14    17
*/
n=7;  
new graph 22 {0,1} {0,2} {1,3} {2,3} 
{3,4} {3,5} {4,6} {5,6} 
{6,7} {6,8} {7,9} {8,9} 
{9,10} {9,11} {10,12} {11,12} 
{12,13} {12,14} {13,15} {14,15} 
{15,16} {15,17} {16,18} {17,18} 
{18,19} {18,20} {19,21} {20,21};
/*  
  1   4   7   10    13    16    19
0   3   6   9    12    15    18    21
  2   5   8   11    14    17    20
*/ 
n=8; 
new graph 25 {0,1} {0,2} {1,3} {2,3} 
{3,4} {3,5} {4,6} {5,6} 
{6,7} {6,8} {7,9} {8,9} 
{9,10} {9,11} {10,12} {11,12} 
{12,13} {12,14} {13,15} {14,15} 
{15,16} {15,17} {16,18} {17,18} 
{18,19} {18,20} {19,21} {20,21} 
{21,22} {21,23} {22,24} {23,24} ;
/*
  1   4   7   10    13    16    19    22
0   3   6   9    12    15    18    21    24
  2   5   8   11    14    17    20    23 */
